name: Monochromatic Simon
description:
Monochromatic Simon

[Version 1.0 is out! This game is also available at avellar.ml!]

Instructions: Do not read beyond this point if you want the full experience!

To play this game, all one has to do is to click the screen according to the amount of times the screen flashes. If the screen flashes 3 times quickly, that means you have lost.
